website_summaries.verdict: In spite of a few concerns, it's a popular pick for its straightforward, spacious design and affordable price. The best value for the money.
pros: shaker w/accessory kit that includes mixing spoon, measuring jigger, and recipe book - all for a surprisingly low price
cons: Some issues with the lid have been reported, including minor leaks and occasional failure to close tightly

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm and doesn't leak
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm and doesn't leak, which is a problem I've had in the past. The build is also really solid. Nothing feels flimsy. The stirring spoon, while thin by necessity, doesn't bend after applying pressure (I essentially did a stress test). The main chamber and jigger are a satisfying thickness without feeling too bulky. The only thing I'd like to have seen is a "half" marker on each side of the jigger. This isn't a huge minus for me, though.
customer_reviews.author: A. Trivedi

customer_reviews.title: Great shaker at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice shaker set. My wife and I typically don’t mix drinks at home but were having friends over for the 4th and decided Margaritas would be fun. This came just in time on the 3rd! It’s very solid and feels more substantial than the price would indicate. It works well with no leaking or spilling and is super easy to use. I love the little measuring cup...I felt like Tom Cruise in Cocktail using it in front of our friends...although my wife discouraged me from throwing bottles in the air! I suspect we’ll be using this for more than just Margaritas in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shake, Shake, Shake
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice beginner set if you want to mix drinks in the comfort of your home. I got the 3-piece set which came with the cocktail shaker, a jigger, mixing spoon and the recipe book. The shaker has a strainer that's included (cobbler-style) and so far, it has been great for mixing drinks. It's made of stainless steel and feels like a quality shaker. Be aware that it can be cold to the touch. Haven't had any trouble with leakage or anything yet. So far, so good! Durability: 5/5 ***** Leak Proof: 5/5 ***** Easy to Clean: 5/5 ***** My Recommendation: 5/5 *****
customer_reviews.author: Vuong Ly

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for making cocktails the right way.
customer_reviews.text: I love this cocktail shaker. It’s sturdy and handsome and practical. It’s easy to clean and fun to use. The only time it leaked was when I put the top on WITH the pour-spout cover already attached. If you put the lid and THEN the spout cover on, you wont have any problem. It is big enough for single or double cocktails. I even used it to make 4 Mojitos at one time and it worked fine, there just wasn’t a lot of room for ice.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price but has started to rust
customer_reviews.text: I like this shaker, fair price but has started to rust at the inner bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Rankiad

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic affordable cocktail shaker set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother who works in a restaurant and is being trained as a bartender, as he doesn't have much of a bar set at home. It looks overall pretty nice. I read some complaints about the shaker seeming a little flimsy, but it's stainless steel and I'm certain it won't damage from normal use. It's pretty basic but it's a good pick for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, nice quality...
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality item. I initially thought it seemed smaller than it should be. It is truly 24 ounce (checked it twice), so it is accurate. I somehow thought 24 oz would be bigger, but that was my fault. It is plenty big enough to make cocktails for two people, and like I said, it seems very high quality. No problem getting the top and bottom separated either (this was mentioned in some other review). Well fitted, well made. Now I want to look for a similar 32 oz version, for parties.
customer_reviews.author: Panther3535Top Contributor: Bass Guitars & Gear

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this! Worst product I’ve ever received from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible product!!!! The lid and top both are stuck on so tight that I cannot use this after only two uses. I am a bartender, I have used multiple types of shaker and strainers and this is by far the worst. I bought this to use at work and cannot use it at all. I would request a refund but it’s not even worth my time. If zero stars was an option that would be my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Makes a great martini
customer_reviews.text: The caps fit on the outside of the shaker so when the shaker gets cold it doesn't seize up. I have to use a bar towel around the outside because of the frost. The towel sticks to the shaker but after I pour I just put tap water in it to free it. The spoon is very strong, despite its appearance. The shaker and spoon are both quality metal. The included double jigger is nice, albeit somewhat small. I use a shot glass at home but the jigger is nice to take along without worrying about breaking. This is a great martini shaker, you'll like it and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Richw

customer_reviews.title: Leaks like a sieve
customer_reviews.text: Got it today and shook some water in it to see if it leaks and it leaks like crazy, I had the lid and strainer on very tight and it dripped out like a leaky faucet as shown in the pic. A shaker that costs $30 should be higher quality than this. My mini shaker that cost less than $10 doesn't leak a single drop. I may have just gotten a bad batch since other reviewers are claiming it doesn't leak at all, I will attempt to reach out to the seller and see if they will replace it with one that works. Will update my review if so.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Spoon is cool though.
customer_reviews.text: Lid doesn't fit. Cheap quality Chinese junk. Spoon is cool though.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: I'm Happy WIth It
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for a while now and put it to good use and I am totally satisfied. It is made of sturdy metal of a decent weight and I have had zero problems with leakage or anything. I love the strainer at the top that makes pouring a good martini much easier. The dual use shot glass comes in handy for unusual drink recipes. You can't go wrong with this set.
customer_reviews.author: James Williams

customer_reviews.title: Shaken not stirred!
customer_reviews.text: Shaker and all the accessories are well made and fit nicely together. I made the perfect martini, with gin of course, shaken not stirred! The little cocktail recipe book on heavy glossy card stock is a real plus. The right size quick reference. I even found room to put my canvas crushed ice bag inside the shaker along with my ice crusher/muddler tool all back in the box.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Wellbrock

customer_reviews.title: I have just recently received my Cresimo Cocktail Shaker and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have just recently received my Cresimo Cocktail Shaker and as such have only put it to use once. That said, it seems to perform as expected. It was a replacement for a plastic cocktail shaker that the coating had begun to "flake off" of. The only issue that I am experiencing with the Cresimo is that the top is very difficult to remove after use....obviously quite opposite from those reviewers who have experienced "leak" issues. My husband has not found removing the top to be a problem. I will update this review should I encounter anything different with ongoing use but at this time I give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: TG 67

customer_reviews.title: It arrived on time and looks to be of good quality. I am a wine and liquor consultant ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this product yet. It arrived on time and looks to be of good quality. I am a wine and liquor consultant so I was going to use this as a secondary mixing set-up for samples. One of the attractions to ordering this was the mixing spoon and jigger. If you are a serious about your cocktails as I am, I would recommend a larger and better quality jigger, although this will get the job done just fine.
customer_reviews.author: SAC

customer_reviews.title: Boba Tea
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly to mix my boba tea in. The seals when the top and cap are on are strong enough so not that a single leak is sprung, But with a good wiggle they come apart. The spoon comes in handy if some powder gets stuck on the bottom and it has a flat stand so that you can put it down and it doesn't make an unexpected bid for freedom. And it is amazingly easy to clean. There are no little crevices where something can hide from you and slowly grow and plot to take over the world when you aren't looking.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and Useful
customer_reviews.text: This is a most efficient cocktail shaker in that it replaces the separate ice strainer with a built-in which I love. It is attractive and easy to clean. It takes up very little storage space which is great
customer_reviews.author: ALICE K.

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband as a stocking stuffer and he was so pleased. Items are high quality and feel durable. The mini recipe book is a nice touch as it includes all the 'basics' someone would need to get started on making the most popular cocktails at home.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Martini Lover's Dream!
customer_reviews.text: High quality sleek cocktail shaker set. Easy to clean and use. The jigger and the mixing spoon is an added bonus! Wish I had invested in one earlier!!
customer_reviews.author: EuroGirl007

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I had an older shaker (don't know the brand) where the lid fit inside the shaker. The shaker developed a crack and would no longer seal. The lid on this shaker fits OUTSIDE the shaker, and cracking and leaking will not (I hope) be an issue. One thing I wish were different (not specific to this set) is that a "jigger" would be 1-1/2 oz instead of 1 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Rusts quickly
customer_reviews.text: We have not even had this for a month and it's already rusting on the inside. Very dissapointing. We have had other stainless steel shakers for years that never rusted.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love my martinis and this shaker is great As soon as you put ice or any cold liquid in it really chills fast! I used to put my martini glasses in the freezer but there is no need to even do this now. The shaker is easy to use.. no leakage, shakes up my martinis so good, cold and perfect. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: Really has some unreasonable sharp edges which is why I rated "cleaning" low. I'm a guy with some tough hands but I could see easily slicing yourself while washing. Will just get accustomed to putting it in the dishwasher I guess. Overall worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: WhatThe

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need for cocktail hour!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice stainless steel set. It has everything you need to shake up cocktails, including a little recipe booklet. The top slides over the cup rather than screwing on, so you just need to make sure you press it down firmly before you shake or you'll end up with a mess. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Terri M.

customer_reviews.title: not a very tight seal
customer_reviews.text: I love this shaker, but as a former bartender I noticed that the seal of the shaker, the top, and the cap is not very tight. Make sure you really hold those pieces together while shaking. Also, be care of what beverages you are shaking in here. sometimes my drinks explode a little when I open the cap after shaking. Otherwise, this is a great addition to my bar, cheap, reliable, and a clean, neat look.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to open after mixing
customer_reviews.text: My previous shakers lid sat inside the main cup which often made it difficult to open after shaking a cocktail. The lid on this item sits outside the cup which eliminates the problem. The measuring cup and spoon are a nice addition. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: latinlaw

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaker
customer_reviews.text: Nice shiny stainless steel. Works great, top fits tight so there is no leaking and best of all it is big enought to fit two drinks so it is a time saver for me!
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS NOW
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING. I didnt think I really needed it, but I do! It gets my drinks so cold super quick! I love that it came with a measuring glass too. Correct measuring matters when it comes to making drinks! I would totally buy this again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This cocktail shaker is exactly what I needed. Before buying this I would use jars and travel coffee mugs to shake my drinks. This works so much better. The drinks get mixed better and turn really cold, and the double jigger is perfect—I especially like the half ounce one—so much easier than what I was using before. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M

customer_reviews.title: Not extremely well made
customer_reviews.text: Thin metal and shaker cup bends easily. Really surprised overall this has a pretty high review. I'll probably keep it, however, not very impressed. It's thin, bends easily and once bent, I think it may not seal tightly. May update this review as I give it time.
customer_reviews.author: Anthem

customer_reviews.title: Overall great product! Just make sure to...
customer_reviews.text: Product met my expectations. The shaker mixes liquids well and the cocktail spoon is a nice touch. I was pleasantly surprised by the amount of cocktail recipes included in the booklet. Definitely a gift-able product to any aspiring or current barista. Just a tip: because of the fact that the product is made of metal, make sure to wipe down the mixer as air drying it will leave some water stains.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lu

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect. Delicious iced teas and lattes for this former ...
customer_reviews.text: I use it every day. Dishwasher safe. People who have a hard time with the top- I take off the small cap to let some air into the container before undoing the main canister. Works perfect. Delicious iced teas and lattes for this former barista. ☺
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: I find it very difficult to lift off/“unscrew” the top and I don’t consider myself a weakling.
customer_reviews.author: Peter@San Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfecf!
customer_reviews.text: This is the nicest thing I have purchased in a long time. The quality is excellent and it comes with a recipe book for 30 cocktails! I’m a beginner and just getting into cocktails so this was beyond perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Good shaker
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in excellent condition and seems to be of good quality. That's all I was looking for. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: T. Q. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE - Exactly as Descried
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to make martinis and mixed drinks. Really love this product and highly recommend. And a terrific Value!
customer_reviews.author: Gail S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect combination of acessories!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new cocktail shaker! It's simple, yet does all it needs to do. The strainer is built in, it comes with a great sized spoon for stirring and a dual jigger. Wouldn't need anything else but oh wait, it also comes with a small booklet with recipes of the best known cocktails. Very happy with my shaker and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it'd do the job
customer_reviews.text: Haven't needed to use the shaker yet but it will seem to do fine for the job. Instead of the stirrer mine came with two spouts for putting on bottles (think what they use to pour from bottles at bars). This was a positive surprise for me but may disappoint others. Mine did come with the hard copy of the common drink booklet, some reviews said they did not receive this. Seems like the true contents vary between purchasers, but if you're primarily looking for a shaker, jigger, and a mystery accessory this would be a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Brad D.

customer_reviews.title: Great set for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fast shipping. The measuring tool is smaller than I thought, I should have read the description better. I assumed it was a shot and a double,not a half shot and a shot. My fault. Otherwise, exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kells

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for your home bar!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! The price is right! I almost want to buy another. I hosted a small family function and made martinis and other mixed drinks that were a hit! No leaks, no rust no fuss!!! My family loved the drinks! The mixing spoon is great for drinks that are stirred, not shaken... the drinks booklet was great, I put a twist on some of them though... Must Buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kan B.

customer_reviews.title: no leaks
customer_reviews.text: Its the only cocktail shaker I've found that does no leak when you shake it and doesn't jam tight. Its a joy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Namazon

customer_reviews.title: Sprang a leak a few months in
customer_reviews.text: I don't use the shaker too much, but I've hosted people a couple of times and made them drinks. The shaker already sprung a leak, so when I shook it, it shook all over me and made a mess of the floor. Kinda funny, but not what you want happening from a $25 set. it's nice looking and relatively easy to clean, but it never looks like new after the first couple of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit and finish
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the new bar. Fits good and snug, no spills. Would get an insolated 1 next, as shaking with ice will quickly sweat the metal
customer_reviews.author: Shaylee larson

customer_reviews.title: Nice, high quality cocktail shaker
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality cocktail shaker. Easy to use and clean. Sturdy materials. Great included features (stirring utensil and measuring cup). Seller is responsive to questions and provided useful cocktail recipes. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: A. McQuoid

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: Love the entire set. Works beyond what I imagined (it's my first time using something like this) Only complaint: the shot glass measuring part does not equal 1 oz. Or a normal shot size.
customer_reviews.author: Corrina Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and more
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bargain set. We got this for our at home bar to see if we would even use it. It does the job and looks great. Looking to upgrade to a better set, but not because there is anything wrong with this one. It is still looks the same as when we took it out of the box despite using it for months.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Good price and works well.
customer_reviews.text: My last shaker went into the trash because I could not get the top off when I was done using it, so I was happy to see that with the Cresimo, the lip of the top fits on the outside of the base. Much more user friendly, and it did not get stuck! I also liked that it was a larger size. I haven't used the pourers yet. I only bought it for the shaker.
customer_reviews.author: msjulia

customer_reviews.title: Shake shake shake!
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't bought for me it was bought for a friend for Christmas and it is exactly what I wanted to get for my friend and I can't wait for them to see it. From what I can tell it looks very durable and easy to clean and will be used often.
customer_reviews.author: Shelia Key

customer_reviews.title: I’m all shook up
customer_reviews.text: I’m doing a diet plan that requires making protein shakes. The plastic shaker smelled bad even after cleaning. I picked this one up to replace the stinky plastic one and it’s awsome. Fit and finish is spot on. The lid and cap fit snugly, but when shaking it’s important to place a finger on the top of the cap while griping the main container or the top will pop off. This is not a defect, it’s how cocktail shakers work😎👍
customer_reviews.author: Djavaman

customer_reviews.title: Lid doesn’t fit.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. There was no “cocktail recipe book” (even though the box said there was), and the lid was EXACTLY the same size as bottom, so it didn’t fit!! So disappointing. Not sure if it’s worth the effort of returning or if I should just throw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: The shaker arrived on time. I opened it up, washed it and immediately put it to use making margaritas. It’s better quality than what I was expecting. Well made, doesn’t leak a drop. I’m very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Top to strainer will not come off!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received my cocktail shaker two days ago. Have tried everything to get the top to the strainer off. It will not budge!!!!! Would give this zero stars because without the use of the strainer the cocktail shaker is of no use to me. Have read other reviews of consumers having the same difficulty. Don't waste your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great set at a great value!
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as described. I decided to take a chance despite the reviews that said it came with rust, and I’m not disappointed. Very satisfied! Also came with recipes for 17 popular cocktails, which was a nice little surprising bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Great cocktail mixer !
customer_reviews.text: This product has everything I expected and more. That makes me look so professional and cool LOL. I appreciate how how it breaks down and is easy to reassemble. I also appreciate the jigger is in two different measurements. I would order this product again
customer_reviews.author: Rosie29

customer_reviews.title: Great shaker
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I really needed a shaker for entertaining when friends came over. This one is well made and comes with everything we needed! We love the tiny recipe book it comes with too
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Dobbs

customer_reviews.title: Mixing Drinks
customer_reviews.text: If you want to mix up some good drinks you need a basic set, this particular set is good for the price, it has everything you need to make any kind of mule. I feel like the jigger could be more quality but again, for the price it is a good set. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good Shaker
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and use, no leaks! We also liked the recipes that came with
customer_reviews.author: Nancy LS

customer_reviews.title: A good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a birthday present for my boyfriend. We use it almost every day. We rinse it right after usage, but if we forget to it’s still easy to clean. No rust, no leaks, easy to use. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Does what it promises!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Jigger is perfect for getting the proper martini gin to vermouth ratios. Easy pop off top to pour your drinks leaving the ice behind. What's not to like? Only negative is that when mixing drinks with ice the metal gets so cold it hurts my hand a little. Not sure if that is normal as this is my first mixer like this.
customer_reviews.author: R. Snow

customer_reviews.title: He Thought He Was a Mixologist!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my hubby and he loves it! Has made drinks using the recipe cards 3 nights straight. Fav part is how the stainless steel frosts during the mix. Drinks are super cold. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kdubz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The item was of very good quality. Packaging in a very sturdy, nice box, not cheap like a lot of boxes you get. Certainly would make a nice gift but this one was just for ME! Already tried it out, works great.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice item!
customer_reviews.text: The shaker came and was just as described. We used it to make dirty martinis and it worked very well. I especially like the muddler that came with it. It is very handy for mojitos, also. It is a nice quality and a very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need in a small package
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect cocktail set for anyone, but especially beginners. The only thing missing is the normal strainer, but that’s OK because the shaker itself has a built in strainer. And this is a first class seller with excellent customer service skills; I wouldn’t think twice about buying from them again.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Good shaker set for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Nice little shaker with all the tools. I don’t have a home bar setup or anything but felt like getting something to try out some cocktail recipes. It does however create a vacuum seal when you’re using it and it takes a little practice to get the lid off to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tm

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Not good quality. I thought the packaging would be better but also the lid doesn't fit
customer_reviews.author: JQC

customer_reviews.title: great value and works great
customer_reviews.text: bought this set during Prime Day and it has been great! Easy to use, doesn't lead, works well and the spoon that comes with it is awesome! Very useful.
customer_reviews.author: sprop

customer_reviews.title: Its Sleek and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this new shaker for my husband to add to his bar....Perfect bartending accessory to mix his margaritas. And it is so good looking. Its is a perfect size and works very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: cocktails !
customer_reviews.text: looked nice n sharp used it twice STARTED TO RUST ALREADY AT THE RIM AT THE TOP SAME PROBLEM AS OTHER CUSTOMER DONT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: "westwoodgamer"

customer_reviews.title: great little set
customer_reviews.text: If you need the essentials for a martini and would rather spend the money on what matters... (the alcohol) then this is your set
customer_reviews.author: Jose G

customer_reviews.title: Chincy
customer_reviews.text: Kinda chincy. Thin metal. Lacks heft. The lid and the shaker dont quite meet correctly. I might go back to buying things in person.
customer_reviews.author: Esperance A Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!
customer_reviews.text: High quality product. Easy to use, does the job professionally. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: David N. Westfall

customer_reviews.title: All parts fit together great and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Not one thing wrong with this and SO worth the money. We have only used it 3-4 x , but great thus far !
customer_reviews.author: Ted Striker

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shaker - used it three times and the lid is stuck on so tight that I’m going to have to throw it away. We have watched every you tube video and tried every method of removing the lid off the container and to no avail. I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shaker
customer_reviews.text: Looking for an affordable, high quality shaker? Look no more! I am super pleased with ours!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Fallon Shepler

customer_reviews.title: Make cocktails etc. with class!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this Shaker! I am using it to make Lemon Drop Cocktails. I will also try it to make a single Margarita.
customer_reviews.author: Allie B.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great shaker for making delicious cocktails
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband and it has made his already stellar cocktail making even better.
customer_reviews.author: Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for Margaritas or any variety of drinks!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he is in love with it . He can make pretty much all the variety of drinks for his friends and family . Now all the Friday’s nights are like a party nights with this cocktail shaker . Good one to have it . Dishwasher safe !!
customer_reviews.author: Praneetha

customer_reviews.title: Looks great even after washing!
customer_reviews.text: We love our new shaker! It didn’t leak, kept drink cold, didn’t leak around strainer, AND I washed it and it still looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Works great, great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for martinis, I use it for everything! Looks great, works great easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: ADRIENNE SABLE

customer_reviews.title: Great gift item.
customer_reviews.text: The product meets all expectations. All pieces are of good quality and the recipe card is included in the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Deb_Shopper

customer_reviews.title: It is not a heavy duty shaker like one would need as a bartender
customer_reviews.text: The cocktail shaker combo is a very well priced item. It includes everything you need, shaker, jigger and stirrer. It came quickly and we put it to use just as quickly. It is not a heavy duty shaker like one would need as a bartender, but is very serviceable for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Jack A. Ott

customer_reviews.title: Party Pleaser
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. We purchased after attending some parties and people not having shakers for good mixed drinks or craft cocktails. We take it along as our travel set now. Shaker works great no problem. I would say they could make the spoon muddler a little more durable, it bends easily when we muddle mint. We just tend to be more gentle!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, very nice product
customer_reviews.text: This shaker is well conceived. Everything fits and it is easy to use as well as very easy to clean. Nice job.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Rock

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and value; doesn’t leak while shaking and brings your liquid to a chilly temperature in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R Gabriele

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for mixology
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!!! It’s such a great starter pack if you want to get into mixology.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey J Juracek

customer_reviews.title: Shaker for Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift. It appears to be good quality and what I was looking for, but I won't know until the person I bought it for uses it. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: SO worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much more than the last cheapie I picked up in a hurry at a teeny store. Should have just done it right in the first place! This will last forever. I love that the strainer is built in and I really like the little shot cup (? not sure what it's called) that comes with it too. It's much nicer than the last one I had. Overall it's a great purchase for the price for sure and I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: ATXE

customer_reviews.title: Shaken, not stirred
customer_reviews.text: It never occurred to me that shaking makes a completely different drink than stirring. I just started mixing drinks myself. I have always stirred. shaking in this device is so much better and a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: EAA

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this cocktail shaker kit. Just what I needed - compact and stunning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous shaker however it is difficult to get the lid off once it is secured. It also doesn’t fit in my cabinet, but looks great on the bar.
customer_reviews.author: MISSLOU

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Set
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for shaking up milk teas. Cap fits on the top perfectly and stays there securely for shaking, AND I also don't have to struggle to get it off afterward. Nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Em Bee

customer_reviews.title: I love this item
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. I made a cocktail every night with this and I love it. The stir stick is so helpful when making drinks. Haven't had a use for the shaker yer but I'm sure I will soon enough. The jig is a bit small but maybe that's the way it's supposed to be designed. You should definitely buy this. Its a good product and package.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Classic Cocktail Shaker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband who is the ‘drinkmaker’ when we host. He looked it over when it arrived and gave it his thumbs-up for quality and for the fact that we’re looking at stainless steel, which was the requirement.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Bennecoff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I’m a bit new to the mixed drink scene, but this seems like a great set. Took the guess work out of mixing Long Island Ice tea, and even comes with a recipe list for some common drinks. Nice feel, quality construction, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy in Maine

customer_reviews.title: Top is difficult to get off!
customer_reviews.text: The top of the shaker is frustratingly difficult to get off after shaking a drink. On the plus side, it doesn’t spill or drip when you’re shaking it. So this shaker is really only good if you purely want to make cocktails that you’re going to strain, but if you wanted to pour it into a glass with the ice used to shake it, it’s very difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Martini Shaker
customer_reviews.text: Used it for this first time the other night. Seems like a quality item, no problems , help to make my drink just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Strasser

customer_reviews.title: Very simple, easy to clean. Looks decently nice on the bar table too
customer_reviews.text: I mean what can I say, worth the purchase if you like to make cocktails
customer_reviews.author: Lukas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shaker
customer_reviews.text: The cocktail shaker came with a list of some recipes, spook and jigger. I have to admit, I've been using it to make margaritas, martinis and even my protein shake in the mornings. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, just as described
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, just as described. I would commend their customer service. I had a question about the shaker and they sent me a brand new one. Really responsive to the customer. But this is a nice set at a very nice price. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Von R. Vandiver

customer_reviews.title: Working Great
customer_reviews.text: This product has held up very well. I don't use it very often but it gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Niki

product_meta.title: Cresimo 24 Ounce Cocktail Shaker Bar Set with Accessories - Martini Kit with Measuring Jigger and Mixing Spoon plus Drink Recipes Booklet - Professional Stainless Steel Bar Tools - Built-in Bartender Strainer
feature_bullets: GREAT VALUE » Complete Cocktail Shaker Bundle Set made of superior 18/8 grade stainless steel. Professional shaker with a 24 oz capacity / built in strainer / a premium double size 1.0 / 0.5 oz measurement jigger tool / a beautiful twisted bar spoon / plus an Illustrated Guide to Cocktails recipe fold out guide.

QUALITY » Cresimo’s cocktail shaker not only looks attractive and elegant but has also been designed to last. Made from high quality stainless steel with a mirror finish, it is guaranteed not to rust or leak and remain on your bar for many years to come!
AMAZINGLY VERSATILE » The perfect drink mixer kit for making ice cold cocktail recipes such as: Margarita’s, Cosmopolitan’s, Long Island Iced Tea’s or Apple Martini’s.

CONVENIENT » Simple and easy to use this shaker is recommended for beginner’s and experienced bartender alike. Experience the improved taste of a large variety of spirits like Tequila, Rum, Vodka, and Liqueurs like never before. It’s certain to be the most used piece of your barware arsenal!

WORRY FREE 2 YEAR WARRANTY » 100% Guarantee! If you are not completely satisfied, contact us immediately! This warranty is exclusive to sales through Cresimo only and purchases made through unauthorized re-sellers will not be covered by this same manufacturer’s warranty.
